name: Stumblehill
summary: Stumblehill is a cute platformer game about a penguin, Ecki, proving themselves by climbing a mountain. Ecki must journey through various areas such as a lush forest and steep hillside during their quest. The game features a simple physics-based game mechanic that adds an extra twist to classic platforming elements.

videos.title: Humble Monthly July 2018 Humble Original: Stumblehill
